mapper.select: SELECT r.reviewno,r.ptno,r.regdate,r.score,r.content, p.userno,p.trainerno,s.schedulecount,u.name FROM review r,pt p,(SELECT ptNo, COUNT(scheduleNo) scheduleCount FROM schedule group by ptNo)s,users u where r.ptno = p.ptno and p.ptno = s.ptno and u.userno = p.userno and p.trainerno= #{no}

SELECT p.userno,p.trainerno,s.schedulecount,u.name FROM pt p,(SELECT ptNo, COUNT(scheduleNo) scheduleCount FROM schedule group by ptNo)s,users u where p.ptno = s.ptno and u.userno = p.userno and p.userno= #{no}
